articles.title: Crypto Tax rules in India: How will cryptocurrency assets be taxed from April 1? - India Today
articles.description: Crypto tax in India: From April 1, a 30 per cent I-T plus cess and surcharges will be levied in the same manner as it treats winnings from horse races or other speculative transactions.
